lines_and_colors: It sounded as if the streets were running -
And then the streets stood still -
Eclipse was all we could see at the Window
And Awe - was all we could feel -
By and by the boldest stole out of his Covert
To see if Time was there
Nature was in the best of humors
document.title: It sounded as if the streets were running
document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
